transcript: Kamal from Indonesia Kamal Hello Hello Alaykumussalam, I can't hear you Okay So, my question is regarding on prayer of Jumu'ah So, as a So, when we are in Masjid we have to listen to what the Imam says and we have to be silent However, if the Imam mentioning the name of the Prophet Muhammad Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam could be replied as well? That's my question, JazakAllah Wa Jazakum So, if while listening to the Khutbah on a Friday and the Imam says and in an authentic Hadith the Prophet Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam said So, he mentions the name of the Prophet and he offers salutation As a follower listening to the Khutbah I'm ordered not to speak not even to reply to Salam when someone comes and says Salam Alaikum I don't reply because the Imam is giving his Khutbah So, when I hear the name of the Prophet Sallallahu Alaihi Wasallam Should I offer salutation? The answer is yes, but you offer it in yourself So, you say you don't utter it out loud and Allah knows best
